forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. South southwest wind 2 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 1pm, then rain and snow between 1pm and 4pm, then rain and snow. Cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. North wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Weather permitting, ski center open Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 30, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Team NordicSkiRacer instructors were out in force this evening, teaching kids to "duck walk" (herringbone) and ski like a pizza slice (snowplow)! Snow conditions were great with a firm skate surface and deep tracks with a little loose snow on them to make classic skiing pretty good.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a great ski day at Nub's Nob with excellent grooming. The temperature should rise to nearly 40 degrees this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
